meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Special Recognition of Owen Hillery McEntee
agenda_items.description: Recognition for his 34 years of service and dedication to the City of Dallas and Park & Recreation Department.

agenda_items.title: Sunset Inn
agenda_items.description: Authorize fee structure for a reservable space at Sunset Inn located at 833 Sunset Inn Circle, Dallas, TX 75218 – Estimated Revenue $5,000.

agenda_items.title: Kevin W. Sloan Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize acquisition of Kevin W. Sloan Park, approximately 162,282 square feet of land (3.73 acres) located between Jefferson Boulevard and Twelfth Street for a proposed new park – Financing: No cost consideration to the City.

agenda_items.title: West Trinity Heights Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize a public hearing to be held on December 11, 2024, to receive comments on the proposed use of a portion of parkland at West Trinity Heights Park for a public drainage project – Revenue: Capital Gifts, Donation & Development Fund $657.77.

agenda_items.title: Fair Park East Dallas Trail
agenda_items.description: Authorize the Advance Funding Agreement with TxDOT for the design and construction of the Fair Park East Dallas Trail in the amount of $8,423,200.00.

agenda_items.title: Fair Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize the third amendment to extend the lease and use agreement between Fair Park First and Live Nation Worldwide for an additional ten years plus two additional 5-year extension options.

financial_items.description: Revenue from West Trinity Heights Park for public drainage project
Funding for Fair Park East Dallas Trail
Estimated Revenue from Fair Park Surcharge & Excess Revenues Fund
